cmp: 串 (to string together/to mix up/to conspire/to connect/(a measure word)/string)
mng: to suffer (from illness), to contract (a disease), misfortune, trouble, danger, worry

exm.mng: to suffer (from an illness), to fall ill
a danger concealed within sth, hidden damage, misfortune not visible from the surface
to worry about personal gains and losses
child victim of disaster or disease, afflicted child
